title: SET_CAM_NEAR_DOF
content:
0x3FA4BF0A7AB7DE2C0xF28254DF// SetCamNearDof
void SET_CAM_NEAR_DOF(Cam cam, float nearDOF);Parameters:cam: The camera handlenearDOF: Distance in in standard unitsSpecifies when the camera should start being in focus. Can be used together with SET_USE_HI_DOF, SET_CAM_FAR_DOF, SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE, SET_CAM_DOF_STRENGTH and other DoF related natives.Usage ExampleA usage example for this native can be found in the following native documentation: SET_CAM_DOF_STRENGTH.
codeBlocks:
// SetCamNearDof
void SET_CAM_NEAR_DOF(Cam cam, float nearDOF);
